translated: The second dhyana is free of investigation and analysis.🔽The third dhyana is free of joy and has equanimity and mindfulness.

original: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: The fourth dhyana is pure, with neither pain nor pleasure and with equanimity and pure mindfulness.

original: rta babs bzhi'o //
analyzed: rta babs bzhi'o //
translated: These four are the four archways.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / dri ma med pa dang / seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi po rnam par dag pa ni kha @17a * //
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / dri ma med pa dang / seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi po rnam par dag pa ni kha @17a * //
translated: The four pure concentrations are the four pure doors: the heroic gait, the sky treasury, the stainless, and the lion’s play.

original: khyer bzhi'o // don dang tshig dang / nges tshig dang / spobs pa bzhi dang / gzungs bzhi rnam par dag pa ni kha khyer la gnas pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs so //
analyzed: khyer bzhi'o // don dang tshig dang / nges tshig dang / spobs pa bzhi dang / gzungs bzhi rnam par dag pa ni kha khyer la gnas pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs so //
translated: The four kinds of retention are the group of offering goddesses who stand on the ledges.

original: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pas ni rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs so //🔽mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang ; lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba gsung rab yan lag dgu gdul bya'i skye bo la bstan pa rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pas ni rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs so // mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang ; lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba gsung rab yan lag dgu gdul bya'i skye bo la bstan pa rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: The fulfillment of all wishes is the various adornments.

original: dril bu dang g-yer kha'i sgra dang ba dan no //
analyzed: dril bu dang g-yer kha'i sgra dang ba dan no //
translated: The purity of the teaching of the nine branches of scripture to the beings to be trained is the sound of the bells and cymbals and the banners.

original: dran pa dang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa dang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: The seven branches of enlightenment are: mindfulness, the investigation of phenomena, effort, joy, fitness, concentration, and equanimity.

original: dra ba dang dra ba byed pa dang / me long dang me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab 'bar ba'o //🔽nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis phyi rol gyi gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa dang po dang / phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis nang gi gzugs de bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dang /
analyzed: dra ba dang dra ba byed pa dang / me long dang me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab 'bar ba'o // nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis phyi rol gyi gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa dang po dang / phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis nang gi gzugs de bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dang /
translated: The seven branches of enlightenment are like a net, the one who spreads the net, a mirror, a garland of flowers, and a burning yak-tail fan.🔽The first liberation is to see external forms as empty, signless, and wishless with the perception of inner formlessness. The second is to see inner forms as such with the perception of external formlessness.

original: nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis gzugs rnams mngon sum du nye bar rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis gzugs rnams mngon sum du nye bar rdzogs par byas te /
translated: The third is to see forms directly and completely with the perception of neither inner nor outer forms.

original: gnas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa dang /
analyzed: gnas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa dang /
translated: the fourth is the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space, the fifth is the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness, the sixth is the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing-whatsoever,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste /
translated: the seventh is the meditative absorption of the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception, and the eighth is the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: 'di dag rnams dag pa ni /
analyzed: 'di dag rnams dag pa ni /
translated: These are purified as follows:

original: sna tshogs rdo rje'i zur bzhi dang logs bzhi'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i zur bzhi dang logs bzhi'o //
translated: The four corners and four sides of the crossed vajra.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i steng gi rim pa dang / 'brel pa'i rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i steng gi rim pa dang / 'brel pa'i rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: The turning of the wheel of dharma of the Vajra Vehicle is the upper level of the center of the crossed vajra, endowed with the connecting vajra lines.

original: 'bras bu dbye bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo shin tu mtho ba'i bye brag gis sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo nyi shu'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dbye bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo shin tu mtho ba'i bye brag gis sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo nyi shu'o //
translated: The result is the twenty peaks of the vajra cross, because of the variety of the peaks of the mountain of the false view of individuality.

original: rten dang brten pa'i dbye bas sa lnga ni ngos @17b rnams dang steng ngo //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dbye bas sa lnga ni ngos @17b rnams dang steng ngo //
translated: The five stages are the sides and the top, because of the division of the support and the supported.

original: gos pa med pa'i chos gcig dang / du ma ji ltar rigs pa rab tu ston pa ni /
analyzed: gos pa med pa'i chos gcig dang / du ma ji ltar rigs pa rab tu ston pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the one uncontaminated dharma and the many as appropriate is

original: lha'i gnas kyi sna tshogs padma'o //
analyzed: lha'i gnas kyi sna tshogs padma'o //
translated: the variegated lotus of the divine abode.

original: byang chub kyi sems yongs su smin par byed pas nyi ma'i gdan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems yongs su smin par byed pas nyi ma'i gdan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The seat of the sun is endowed with the sun, because of the ripening of the mind of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu 'phel bar byed pas zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu 'phel bar byed pas zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The seat of the moon is endowed with the moon, because of the growth of the sprout of the mind of enlightenment.

original: snying rje'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang bas na bum pa brgyad do //
analyzed: snying rje'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang bas na bum pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight vases are filled with the nectar of compassion.

original: chos kyi 'od kyi sgron ma'i grags pa ni dri zhim pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'od kyi sgron ma'i grags pa ni dri zhim pa'o //
translated: The fragrance is the lamp of the light of Dharma.

original: chos kyi zas ni bshos gtsang ste /
analyzed: chos kyi zas ni bshos gtsang ste /
translated: The pure food is the food of Dharma.

original: de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: Such is the reality of the mandala.

original: lha'i de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: The reality of the deities will be described.

original: de la rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / zhe sdang chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / zhe sdang chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Therein, the aggregate of consciousness, the great hatred, the utterly pure, and the gnosis of the dharmadhatu are the Blessed One.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsdus pas gnag pa ni nag po'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsdus pas gnag pa ni nag po'o //
translated: Since it includes the afflictions of all beings, it is black.

original: brtags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: brtags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do //
translated: Since it is the nirvana of imagination, it is Yamantaka.

original: shin tu gdug pa can drag po zhi bas mi 'dul la khro bo chen po'o //
analyzed: shin tu gdug pa can drag po zhi bas mi 'dul la khro bo chen po'o //
translated: Since it is not subdued by the pacification of the extremely violent, it is the great wrathful one.

original: rnam thar sgo gsum rnam par dag pa zhal gsum mo //
analyzed: rnam thar sgo gsum rnam par dag pa zhal gsum mo //
translated: Since it is the purification of the three doors of liberation, it has three faces.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas phyag drug go //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas phyag drug go //
translated: Since it is the perfection of the six perfections, it has six arms.

original: ser sna la sogs pa 'jig par mdzad pas rdo rje la sogs pa drug phyag na bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: ser sna la sogs pa 'jig par mdzad pas rdo rje la sogs pa drug phyag na bsnams pa'o //
translated: Since it destroys stinginess and so forth, it holds a vajra and so forth in its six hands.

original: zhe sdang gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jig pas sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jig pas sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: Since it destroys the secondary afflictions of the aspect of hatred, it is adorned with snakes.

original: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pas rang dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes la 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pas rang dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes la 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Since the two accumulations are completely perfected, he is embraced by the gnosis that is equal to himself.

original: rtag tu sems can gyi don mdzad pas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rtag tu sems can gyi don mdzad pas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Since he always acts for the welfare of sentient beings, he is the essence of innate bliss.

original: chos kyi sku nyid kyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku nyid kyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku mdzad pa'o //
translated: Since he is the dharmakāya itself, he is the activity of the saṃbhogakāya and nirmāṇakāya.

original: gzugs kyi phung po dang gti mug chen po rnam par dag pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das gti mug gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po dang gti mug chen po rnam par dag pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das gti mug gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The form aggregate and the purification of great delusion are the mirror-like gnosis of Bhagavat Hatred Yamāntaka.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The others are the same as before.

original: gti mug gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phra ma chen po dang / tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das phra ma gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: gti mug gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phra ma chen po dang / tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das phra ma gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The great malice that is a branch of delusion and the purification of the aggregate of feeling and the gnosis of uniformity are Bhagavat Malice Yamāntaka.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest are the same as before.

original: nga rgyal gyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'dod chags chen po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni /
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'dod chags chen po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni /
translated: The subsidiary defilement of the part of pride,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do //
translated: great passion, the purified aggregate of perception, and the wisdom of discernment is the Lord Yamântaka of Passion.
The subsidiary defilement of the part of passion,

original: chags kyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / phrag dog chen po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das phrag dog gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: chags kyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / phrag dog chen po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das phrag dog gshin rje gshed do //
translated: great envy, the purified aggregate of mental formations, and the wisdom of successful activities is the Lord Yamântaka of Envy.

original: phrag dog gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / phung po'i bdud la dad pa rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: phrag dog gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / phung po'i bdud la dad pa rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: The subsidiary defilement of the part of envy, the view of the transitory collection, the obscuration of knowledge, and the purified faith in the demon of the aggregates is

original: bcom ldan 'das thob gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thob gshin rje gshed do //
translated: the Lord Yamântaka of Destruction.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das dbyug pa gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das dbyug pa gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The pure exertion that overcomes the secondary defilements that are in conformity with the adverse side, the extreme views, the obscurations of the desire realm, and the demon of the afflictions is the Bhagavat Daṇḍa-Yamântaka.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun par nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud la dran pa rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das pa padma gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun par nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud la dran pa rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das pa padma gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The pure mindfulness that overcomes the secondary defilements that are in conformity with the adverse side, the obscurations of karma, the overesteeming of (inferior) ethics and modes of conduct, and the demon of the Lord of Death is the Bhagavat Padma-Yamântaka.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu rnam par g-yeng byed bdud la ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ral gri gshin rje gshed do //🔽sa'i khams dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'o //🔽chu'i khams dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu rnam par g-yeng byed bdud la ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ral gri gshin rje gshed do // sa'i khams dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'o // chu'i khams dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: Vajra Vetali is the purity of meditative concentration.🔽The earth element, the perfection of skillful means, and the essence of great loving kindness is Vajra Cacchi.🔽The water element, the perfection of aspiration, and the essence of great compassion is Vajra Varahi.

original: me'i khams dang stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje dbyangs can ma'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dang stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje dbyangs can ma'o //
translated: The fire element, the perfection of strength, and the essence of great joy is Vajra Sarasvati.

original: rlung gi khams dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje goo r'i ma'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje goo r'i ma'o //
translated: The wind element, the perfection of wisdom, and the essence of great equanimity are Vajragauri's.

original: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa dag pa ni thod pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa dag pa ni thod pa bzhi'o //
translated: The purity of external forms, etc. are the four skull-cups.

original: nang dri zhim pos kyang bkang ba ni /
analyzed: nang dri zhim pos kyang bkang ba ni /
translated: Filled with fragrant substances,

original: chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro'o //
translated: the all-pervading realm of phenomena.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa sa dang sbyar ba yang brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa sa dang sbyar ba yang brtag par bya'o //
translated: The perfections and the levels should also be analyzed.

original: stobs dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa ma bris pa ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas 'jigs pas so //
analyzed: stobs dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa ma bris pa ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas 'jigs pas so //
translated: The powers, the unentangled qualities, etc. are not written about here for fear of being too wordy.

original: de lta bu ni lha'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bu ni lha'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: Such is the reality of the deities.

original: de nas slob dpon gyi las te bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang / bza' ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa rgyud de dang de dag bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de nas slob dpon gyi las te bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang / bza' ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa rgyud de dang de dag bstan pa'o //
translated: Next, the master's activities are the commitments of protection and enjoyment, and the practice of the tantras that teach those.

original: bdag bsrung ba ni so so 'brang @18b ma'i dkyil 'khor dang sgrub thabs bstan pas so //
analyzed: bdag bsrung ba ni so so 'brang @18b ma'i dkyil 'khor dang sgrub thabs bstan pas so //
translated: Self-protection is taught by the Cakrasaṃvara mandala and the sādhana.

original: slob dpon 'jug pa ni gtor ma byin te /
analyzed: slob dpon 'jug pa ni gtor ma byin te /
translated: The master's entry is giving the bali.

original: de la rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / btung ba blang pa la sogs pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang ;
analyzed: de la rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / btung ba blang pa la sogs pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang ;
translated: The master who possesses the four yogas should offer the sacrificial cake that is endowed with various things, such as the substances to be eaten, licked, drunk, and so on, along with incense, garlands, ointments, powders, clothes,

original: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu la sogs pa'i sgra chen po kun rdzob tu rdzogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma shing rta bkang ba'am /
